toolclip.title: Grease Pencil
toolclip.text: Tools to sketch on top of your 3D view at different points in time.

resourcelist.link: Draw on the scene view with Grease Pencil

toolclip.title: Add Frame
toolclip.text: Creates a transparent Grease Pencil canvas at the current time.

toolclip.title: Remove Frame
toolclip.text: Removes the Grease Pencil canvas from the current time.

toolclip.title: Pencil
toolclip.text: Draws on the Grease Pencil canvas at the current time.

resourcelist.link: Draw on the scene view with Grease Pencil

toolclip.title: Marker
toolclip.text: Draws on the Grease Pencil canvas using a thicker brush style.

resourcelist.link: Draw on the scene view with Grease Pencil

toolclip.title: Soft pencil
toolclip.text: Draws on the Grease Pencil canvas using a softer brush style.

resourcelist.link: Draw on the scene view with Grease Pencil

toolclip.title: Change Color
toolclip.text: Changes the color of the active brush.

toolclip.title: Eraser
toolclip.text: Erases on the current Grease Pencil canvas.

toolclip.text: Displays ghost sketches before Grease Pencil frames.
